title: Reuters reveals Turkey sells battle-tested drones to UAE as regional rivals mend ties
dc:creator: Ramisa Tasnim
description:
Reuters exclusively reported Turkish defence firm Baykar has delivered 20 armed drones to the United Arab Emirates this month and […]

The post Reuters reveals Turkey sells battle-tested drones to UAE as regional rivals mend ties appeared first on Reuters News Agency.
content:encoded:
Reuters exclusively reported Turkish defence firm Baykar has delivered 20 armed drones to the United Arab Emirates this month and could sell more, as a diplomatic detente between the former regional rivals expands into military contracts.

The post Reuters reveals Turkey sells battle-tested drones to UAE as regional rivals mend ties appeared first on Reuters News Agency.
